statements: SELECT * FROM enrollment;
SELECT student_id, enrollment_date FROM enrollment;
SELECT course_id, program_id FROM enrollment WHERE student_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM enrollment ORDER BY enrollment_date DESC;
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_enrollments FROM enrollment;
SELECT * FROM enrollment WHERE student_id = 1
SELECT course_id, program_id FROM enrollment WHERE enrollment_date > '2022-01-01'
SELECT student_id, course_id, program_id, enrollment_date FROM enrollment WHERE program_id = 3 ORDER BY student_id DESC
SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT program_id) AS program_count FROM enrollment GROUP BY program_id HAVING COUNT(DISTINCT program_id) > 1
SELECT AVG(course_id) AS avg_course_id FROM enrollment
SELECT * FROM students;
SELECT student_name, course_id FROM students WHERE student_id = 1;
SELECT course_name, capacity FROM courses;
SELECT course_name, capacity FROM courses WHERE capacity > 100;
SELECT student_name, course_name FROM students JOIN courses ON students.course_id = courses.course_id;
SELECT * FROM students WHERE course_id = 1 ORDER BY student_name ASC;
SELECT student_id, student_name, c.course_name FROM students s JOIN courses c ON s.course_id = c.course_id WHERE s.student_id = 3;
SELECT student_name, c.capacity FROM students s LEFT JOIN courses c ON s.course_id = c.course_id WHERE c.capacity > 30;
SELECT s.student_id, s.student_name, c.course_name FROM students s JOIN courses c ON s.course_id = c.course_id WHERE c.course_id = 2 ORDER BY s.student_id DESC;
SELECT student_id, student_name FROM students WHERE student_name LIKE '%en%' AND course_id IN (SELECT course_id FROM courses WHERE capacity > 20);
SELECT * FROM Courses;
SELECT course_name, instructor FROM Courses;
SELECT student_name, email FROM Students;
SELECT course_name, instructor, capacity FROM Courses WHERE capacity > 50;

SELECT course_name, student_name, enrollment_date FROM Courses JOIN Enrollments ON Courses.course_id = Enrollments.course_id JOIN Students ON Enrollments.student_id = Students.student_id ORDER BY enrollment_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM Courses;
SELECT course_name, instructor FROM Courses ORDER BY course_name DESC;
SELECT student_name, email, major FROM Students WHERE major = 'Computer Science';
SELECT course_name, instructor, capacity FROM Courses WHERE capacity > 30 ORDER BY capacity DESC;

SELECT Courses.course_name, Students.student_name, Enrollments.enrollment_date FROM Courses INNER JOIN Enrollments ON Courses.course_id = Enrollments.course_id INNER JOIN Students ON Enrollments.student_id = Students.student_id;
SELECT * FROM students;
SELECT student_name, enrollment_status FROM students WHERE enrollment_status='enrolled';
SELECT course_name, capacity FROM courses ORDER BY capacity DESC;
SELECT student_id, program_id, course_id FROM student_enrollment WHERE student_id=1;
SELECT program_name FROM programs WHERE program_id=3;
SELECT * FROM students ORDER BY student_name ASC;
SELECT student_name, enrollment_status FROM students WHERE enrollment_status = 'enrolled';

SELECT students.student_name, courses.course_name FROM students JOIN student_enrollment ON students.student_id = student_enrollment.student_id JOIN courses ON student_enrollment.course_id = courses.course_id;

SELECT student_name, program_name FROM programs JOIN student_enrollment ON programs.program_id = student_enrollment.program_id JOIN students ON student_enrollment.student_id = students.student_id WHERE students.enrollment_status = 'enrolled';
SELECT * FROM student_enrollment WHERE enrollment_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT * FROM students;
SELECT id, name, email FROM students WHERE program_id = 1;
SELECT name, email FROM students ORDER BY name DESC;
SELECT students.name, courses.name FROM students JOIN enrollments ON students.id = enrollments.student_id JOIN courses ON enrollments.course_id = courses.id;
SELECT * FROM courses WHERE capacity > 20;
SELECT * FROM students WHERE program_id = 1;
SELECT name, email FROM students ORDER BY name DESC;
SELECT students.name, courses.name FROM students INNER JOIN enrollments ON students.id = enrollments.student_id INNER JOIN courses ON enrollments.course_id = courses.id;

SELECT students.name, courses.name, enrollments.enrollment_date FROM students INNER JOIN enrollments ON students.id = enrollments.student_id INNER JOIN courses ON enrollments.course_id = courses.id WHERE courses.capacity > 20;

SELECT programs.name, COUNT(enrollments.id) AS total_enrollments FROM programs INNER JOIN programs_courses ON programs.id = programs_courses.program_id INNER JOIN courses ON programs_courses.course_id = courses.id INNER JOIN enrollments ON courses.id = enrollments.course_id GROUP BY programs.id ORDER BY total_enrollments DESC;
